english.segment1: Yesterday, I found that everything I knew was wrong. It was upside down, the life I thought I had was gone
english.segment2: But You came and whispered love to me. And You gave me strength to carry on
english.segment3: Oh, the sun is shining. There is hope for me again. A new day's dawning, the sun is shining
english.segment4: Yesterday, I lost everything I had and loved. Then I cried out for You, Lord. And You came and picked me up
english.segment5: And the sorrow lasted through the night. But the joy came with the morn
english.segment6: I will lift my voice. No, I won't be silent, for You heard my cry. And You turned my mourning into dancing. And so forever, I'll sing.
